item.description:
I just found out the Library is closed on Thursdays for the
Winter. The meeting scheduled for this Thursday Sept 11 has
been changed to Monday Sept. 15.

Thanks

Don Roberts

Donna,

The 7HCC digital group will hold it's next meeting
September 11th, 7 pm, Banx room of the Worcester Library.

Everyone is invited to join our fun!

We will be talking about Photoshop Smart Objects and anything else
that may come up.

Don Roberts

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: 7HCC digital group
